Reviews.Title: “Cheap but at a price”
Reviews.Author: MidlandsArttravel
Reviews.Content: Ok this place is cheap,clean and convenient..but there is no service not even by apartment standards.. and it is very very noisy..sadly it attracts the type of person who wants to party all night and I mean all night..one went on to 0500..I will never use again but if you want somewhere cheap to leave your luggage and maybe get the odd nap..its OK

Reviews.Title: “awesome location, decent apartments”
Reviews.Author: Gavin S
Reviews.Content: the location of these apartments were awesome.It located jus 2 min walk froim abt 3 or 4 major squares and the main shopping streets. Step out of your door and you surrounded by restaurants amd pubs on all sides. the apartments are basic but clean.. They come with waching machines, burners, microwave. The only drawback abt these apartments was that the elevator stop at the middle landing of everyfloor so you either have to carry your bags half a flight of stairs up or down.

Reviews.Title: “Highly disappointing and unacceptable”
Reviews.Author: auckland13
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in the Apartments for a 1 month stay from 07th Dec to 10 Jan 2011. The pictures and descriptions do not do the property any justice. It is an awful place, badly managed, badly maintained and barely pass the test for fit for purpose. This is hospitality at its worst and a customer service attitude to go with it. There is a lack of basic facilities ie no drinking glasses, chipped crockery,equipment that does not work, albeit all IKEA, lights that do not work, a long and winding staircase, unkept communal areas, internet connection that does not work and hot water than only last for 3 minutes, which makes showering very limiting. The property is maintained by FriendlyRentals in Madrid and believe you me they are not at all very friendly when you confront them with an issue. There seems to be no standard in maintenance and nothing is maintained, serviced or prepared adequately. I strongly recommend not to use these apartments until they upgrade and refit out the apartments as I found out that the pictures on the internet is totally deceiving and inaccurate. I have complained about them to the Spanish Tourist Authority.

HotelInfo.Name: Apartamentos City Center Santa Ana
HotelInfo.Address: Cruz, 22, 28012 Madrid, Spain
